main event: An unidentified object was observed by a commercial aircraft crew during a flight from New York to Lisbon on September 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, oval-shaped, luminous object that was traveling at an estimated speed of 3,000 knots.
The object was observed for approximately 5-10 seconds before it disappeared from view.
The navigator immediately reported the sighting to the pilot, who also briefly observed the object.
The incident was reported to Project Blue Book, the U.S. Air Force's official program for investigating UFO sightings.
The report included a Doppler chart as an attachment.
location: Atlantic Ocean, between New York and Lisbon
